text: Pechora (; Komi: Печӧра, Pečöra) is a town in the Komi Republic in Russia. It is on the Pechora River and nearby the Ural Mountains. == History == Pechora was founded in 1940 and given town status in 1949. It was used as a gulag in the Soviet Union from 1932 to 1953. == Transportation == The town has the Pechora Airport and the Pechora Railway for transportation. == Military == Pechora has a military air base and a radar station nearby. == Climate == Pechora has a subarctic climate (Köppen climate classification Dfc). Winters are very cold while summers are mild. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in the Komi Republic
title: Pechora
